mapper.insert: insert into dish (name, category_id, price, image, status, create_time, create_user, update_time, update_user) values (#{name}, #{categoryId}, #{price}, #{image}, #{status}, #{createTime}, #{createUser}, #{updateTime}, #{updateUser})
mapper.update:
UPDATE dish
name = #{name},
category_id = #{categoryId},
price = #{price},
image = #{image},
status = #{status},
update_time = #{updateTime},
update_user = #{updateUser}
where id = #{id}
mapper.select: SELECT d.id, d.name, d.category_id, d.price, d.image, d.description, d.status, d.update_time, c.name as category_name FROM dish d LEFT JOIN category c ON d.category_id = c.id WHERE d.id = #{id}
